main.description: Specifies a process in a recipe for use in planning from recipe.

hasRecipeInput.description: All the inputs of a recipe process.

hasRecipeOutput.description: All the outputs of a recipe process.

hasDuration.description: The temporal extent of the process.

image.description: The uri to an image relevant to the entity, such as a logo, avatar, photo, diagram, etc.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.

processClassifiedAs.description: References one or more uri's for a concept in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme for purposes of categorization or grouping; or can be one or more string classifications such as tags.

processConformsTo.description: The standard specification or definition of a type of process.

measure.description: A quantity expressed as a numeric value with a unit of measure. AT Protocol does not support floats, so the value is represented as numerator/denominator integers.

hasDenominator.description: The denominator for fractional values. Default 1 if omitted.

unitLabel.description: The display label of the unit of measure (e.g. 'kilogram', 'hour').

unitSymbol.description: The display symbol of the unit of measure (e.g. 'kg', 'h').
